font.p: We know that [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is onto if and only if the system [mathjaxinline]Ax=v[/mathjaxinline] is consistent for all [mathjaxinline]v\in \mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline]. This is true if and only if [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] row reduces to a matrix with no rows of all zeros.
